creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: five vignettes featuring scenes of birds; from UL: small songbird with brown, white, and grey feathers perched on a thistle; hawk in profile perched on branch; hen and rooster with two chicks; three birds in pine branch; and two black birds on a shoreline with red leaves and red berries
markings: various intaglio and relief stamps throughout
title: Album Leaf with Birds
